alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:11AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Towner, Cavalier, northwestern Ramsey and northwestern Pembina Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 410 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starkweather, or 25 miles north of Devils Lake, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hampden, Alsen and Derrick around 420 AM CDT. Loma around 430 AM CDT. Dresden around 440 AM CDT. Langdon around 445 AM CDT. Vang around 500 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
